agency.name: Illinois Law Enforcement Training and Standards Board

schedules.retention_statement_global: Records related to digital evidence collection, processing, storage, and chain of custody for law enforcement investigations and court proceedings.
schedules.notes: Includes provisions for cloud storage and blockchain verification systems. Updated to address emerging digital forensics technologies.

schedules.retention_statement_global: Documentation of community engagement activities, public safety programs, neighborhood watch coordination, and community partnership initiatives.
schedules.notes: Under review for compliance with new community engagement reporting requirements. May require revision based on stakeholder feedback.

series_items.description: Digital evidence collected from electronic devices including computers, mobile phones, storage media, and network systems. Includes forensic images, metadata, chain of custody documentation, and analysis reports.
series_items.arrangement: By case number and chronological by collection date
series_items.retention_text: Retain for 25 years after case closure or until all appeals are exhausted, whichever is longer
series_items.retention_trigger: Case closure and completion of all appeals
series_items.electronic_records_standard: E01 forensic image format with SHA-256 hash verification
series_items.media_types: forensic disk images; mobile device extractions; network packet captures; digital photographs
series_items.series_notes: Critical for criminal prosecutions and civil litigation. Subject to strict chain of custody requirements and encryption standards.
series_items.contact: Detective Sarah Martinez, Digital Forensics Specialist
series_items.location: Evidence Building, Secure Digital Storage Facility
series_items.number_size_files: Approximately 1,200 cases with associated digital evidence
series_items.index_or_finding_aids: Digital evidence management system with case tracking and hash verification database

series_items.record_series_title: Forensic Analysis Reports and Expert Testimony Records
series_items.description: Technical analysis reports, expert witness testimony preparation materials, court presentation files, and forensic examination documentation for digital evidence cases.
series_items.arrangement: By examiner and chronological by analysis completion date
series_items.retention_text: Retain permanently as expert testimony may be referenced in future cases and appeals
series_items.electronic_records_standard: PDF/A-2b for reports, native formats for supporting data files
series_items.media_types: technical reports; expert testimony transcripts; court presentation materials; analysis software outputs
series_items.series_notes: Contains expert opinions and methodologies that establish precedent for future cases. Historical value for forensic science development.
series_items.contact: Dr. Jennifer Kim, Senior Forensic Analyst
series_items.index_or_finding_aids: Forensic case management system with searchable analysis database and expert testimony archive
series_items.omb_or_statute_refs: 50 ILCS 205; 735 ILCS 5/8-2501 (Expert Testimony); Federal Rules of Evidence 702

series_items.description: Documentation of partnerships with community organizations, schools, businesses, and civic groups including partnership agreements, program evaluations, activity reports, and outcome assessments.
series_items.arrangement: By program type and partner organization name
series_items.retention_text: Retain for 10 years after program completion or partnership termination
series_items.electronic_records_standard: PDF/A for agreements, Excel native format for evaluation data
series_items.media_types: partnership agreements; program evaluations; activity reports; digital photographs; video recordings
series_items.series_notes: Includes grant-funded programs requiring federal reporting compliance. Contains community feedback and program effectiveness data.
series_items.number_size_files: Partnership records for 45+ active community programs
series_items.index_or_finding_aids: Community partnership database with program tracking and outcome measurement system
series_items.omb_or_statute_refs: 50 ILCS 205; 2 CFR 200 (Uniform Administrative Requirements for Federal Grants)

series_items.record_series_title: Public Safety Education and Training Materials
series_items.description: Educational materials, training curricula, public safety presentations, community workshop resources, and outreach program content developed for public education initiatives.
series_items.arrangement: By program topic and target audience
series_items.retention_text: Retain for 7 years after last use, with permanent retention for award-winning or historically significant programs
series_items.retention_trigger: Last program use or historical significance determination
series_items.electronic_records_standard: PDF/A for printed materials, MP4 for video content, PowerPoint native format for presentations
series_items.media_types: printed brochures; digital presentations; educational videos; interactive training modules; social media content
series_items.series_notes: Includes multilingual materials and accessibility-compliant formats. Some materials may have permanent historical value for community policing evolution.
series_items.contact: Officer Maria Gonzalez, Public Education Coordinator
series_items.number_size_files: Educational materials for 25+ different public safety topics
series_items.index_or_finding_aids: Public education resource database with topic indexing and usage tracking system
